full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'KHYER BDE BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES ME MCHOD BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SLOB MA DPYOD LDAN DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG RDO RJE'I MING CAN NAS PHYOGS 'DIR ME MCHOD KYI SROL KUN TU DAR YANG, MCHOD THABS YID BRTAN RUNG BA ZHIG MI SNANG BAS KHUNGS LDAN 'KHYER BA DE'I CHOG ZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LTAR TSAD THUB KYI DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG GI PHYAG SROL DANG SGO BSTUN TE, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL DU BRIS PA 'DIS BYAR SKYE 'THO MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
